column8: One of a series of Crestline t shirts.  Some of the Victorias, intended for law enforcement had a Holley four barrel carburettor with about 50 bhp more than the models intened for the retail market.  I just think they epitomise 50's Americana - exuberant and unashamedly commercial without being self concious.  Celebrate the Ford Crestline Vic wear our t shirt.
